article_title: Bernard Schoenburg: Speaker Madigan honest in law firm talk, Tony Leone says

article_metadata.description:
TONY LEONE, a former clerk of the Illinois House and owner of a Springfield bed-and-breakfast where Gov. BRUCE RAUNER held a rally the day before his November election, recalled this week a meeting he had with House Speaker MICHAEL MADIGAN, D-Chicago.
And he said what happened there should give people pause as they question Madigan's ethics concerning his law firm.
Leone had been chairman of the Sangamon County Board of Review, which hears appeals of property tax assessments. He also had been
article_metadata.author: Bernard Schoenburg, Political Writer
